691310.name: Trouble Witches Origin,Special additional character : Cotton
691310.description:
Collaboration of "Trouble☆Witches Origin" and "COTTOn" Outline

The legendary witch shooter "COTTOn", collaboration with "Trouble☆Witches Origin".
Cotton and Silk came to C by some kind of mistakes. They play an active to daughters of Amalugam.
Cotton is adheres to WILLOW as usual. Draupnir is at a loss for her reckless action.
Cotton and Sikk are strongest ever of Trouble Witches, and it may be easy even if a degree of difficulty is high!?
Regardless of ability, support it.
That provides ease and power of use for beginners and power for experts.


■Collaboration Point

●You can use "Cotton" in "Arcade mode" "Story mode" and "Score attack" all modes.
●Cotton and Silk from fairyland "Filament". They are strongest ever of Trouble Witches!
"Gero Gero mode" may also is easy!?
●Changeable to BGM of the first COTTOn! Impressed by famous tunes of the FM sound!
●"The Teatime" after having defeated a boss. Results may rise with bonus score.
●Story is a full voice! Cotton and Silk look for WILLOW in the different world. Enjoy the new adventure of them!

------------------------------------------------------
Trouble Witches Origin！　Special Additional Character Cotton. Outline

Graphics : Support to DirectX11 Graphics
